definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: Corner detection is the main task of the image processing in camera calibration.
sentences.chinese: 特徵角點的提取是攝像機定標中圖像處理的主要任務。

sentences.english: In fact, the focus of this paper is the logic verification of the Scaler chip.
sentences.chinese: 本文的重點爲定標器芯片的邏輯驗證。

sentences.english: This can be achieved by SAR Radiometric Calibration.
sentences.chinese: 這個工作是由SAR輻射定標完成的。

sentences.english: Fashion designers feel beauty should not have a legal standard.
sentences.chinese: 時尚設計師認爲美是不需要有個法定標準的。

sentences.english: A floating calibration method for resistance moisture teller is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於浮動定標原理的示值標定方法。

sentences.english: Multi-wavelength intensity calibration procedure based on ICCD detector has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於ICCD探測器的多波長強度定標方法。

sentences.english: The legal criterion of divorce is proper to resume generalization doctrine.
sentences.chinese: 離婚法定標準宜恢復爲概括主義。

sentences.english: The calibration method of automatic analysis for seawater nutrients in situ has been optimized.
sentences.chinese: 對海水營養鹽現場自動測量定標方法進行了優化研究。

sentences.english: Moreover, the calibration scheme is outlined on the basis of the characteristics of radiometry for shooting range.
sentences.chinese: 根據靶場輻射測量特點，設計了整體定標方案。

sentences.english: Followed by the statutory criteria for the completion of the land resettlement compensation for the demolition work.
sentences.chinese: 隨後按法定標準完成了徵地拆遷安置補償工作。

sentences.english: The body cavity mucosa scaling biopsy forceps includes handle with chute on its side;
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種體腔粘膜定標活檢鉗。

sentences.english: Finally, the key technological problems of the calibration technologies under researching are analyzed predicatively.
sentences.chinese: 對未來需要開展研究的定標技術做了初步分析。

sentences.english: The V-shaped upper section is provided with a cut-out for the scale and the measuring capillaries.
sentences.chinese: 形的上部有一個開口用於定標和測量毛細管。

sentences.english: It has been proved that the device satisfies all requirements of the large aperture infrared opto-electric system by experiments.
sentences.chinese: 實驗表明，能滿足大口徑紅外光電系統的定標要求。

sentences.english: FPGA synthesis is employed to perform the logic verification for the front-end design of the Scaler.
sentences.chinese: 定標器芯片前端設計通過FPGA實現進行邏輯驗證。

sentences.english: Secondly, the relation between high resolution spaceborne SAR radiometric calibration and SMP is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 定標與衛星運動參數的關聯技術。
